title: ACCOUNTANCY
utme_requirements:
Five (5) SSC credit passes in English Language not Literature in English and Mathematics and any three (3) subjects from the following

Economics, Commerce/Marketing,

Business Methods,

Principles of Accounts/Book Keeping

Geography

Office Practice

Government,

Biology/Agricultural Science,

Chemistry,

Physics,

History/Government

Typewriting

Shorthand
subjects: Mathematics and two (2) of Geography, Commerce, Government, Principles of Accounts and Economics.

title: AGRICULTURAL & BIO-ENVIRONMENTAL  ENGINEERING TECH
utme_requirements:
Five (5) SSC credit passes in Mathematics, English Language, Physics and any two (2) of the following:

Biology/Agricultural Science

Chemistry

Technical Drawing

Basic Electronics/Basic Electricity

Auto Mechanics

Metal Work

Further Mathematics

Food and Nutrition

Geography,  Animal/Husbandry/Fisheries
subjects: Mathematics and Physics/Technical Drawing, Chemistry or any two (2) Science subjects.

title: ARCHITECTURAL TECHNOLOGY
utme_requirements:
Five (5) SSC credit passes in Mathematics, Physics, English Language and any two (2) subjects from the following:

Biology,

Fine Art,

Chemistry,

History

English Language,

Geography,

Further Mathematics

Economics/Commerce,

Religious Knowledge,

Technical Drawing,

Business Method.

'O' Level pass in Fine Art or Technical Drawing will be an advantage.
subjects: Mathematics and any two (2) of Physics, Chemistry and Technical Drawing.

title: ART & DESIGN
utme_requirements:
Five (5) SSC credit passes in English Language,  Mathematics and any three (3) of the following:

Chemistry, Physics,

Biology/Agricultural Science,

Literature in English,

Clothing and Textiles,

Religious Knowledge,

Economics/Commerce, Yoruba or any other Nigerian Language,

Geography, Home Economics, Fine Arts/Visual Arts
subjects: Fine Art and any two (2) of History, Chemistry, Mathematics, Biology and a Nigerian Language.

title: BANKING & FINANCE
utme_requirements:
Five (5) SSC credit passes in English Language (not Literature in English) and Mathematics and any three (3) subjects from the following:

Economics, Commerce/Marketing,

Business Methods,

Principles of Accounts,

Geography

Office Practice

Biology/Agricultural Science,

Chemistry,

Physics,

History/Government

Typewriting

Shorthand
subjects: Mathematics and any two (2) of Economics, Geography, History, Government, Commerce or Principles of Accounts.

title: BUILDING TECHNOLOGY
utme_requirements:
Five (5) SSC credit passes in Mathematics, English Language and Physics or Chemistry and any two (2) of the following:

Economics/Commerce,

Technical Drawing/Fine Art,

Chemistry, Physics,

Geography,

Further Mathematics

Woodwork,

Biology,

Religious Knowledge,

Metal Work,

 A pass in Art or Technical Drawing will be an added advantage
subjects: Mathematics, Physics and Chemistry or Fine Arts.

title: BUSINESS ADMINISTRATION & MANAGEMENT
utme_requirements:
Five (5) SSC credit passes in English Language,  Mathematics and Economics and any two (2) subjects from the following:

Commerce,

Business Methods,

Principles of Accounts,

Literature in English

Geography

Office Practice

Biology/Agricultural Science,

Chemistry,

Physics,

History/Government

Typewriting

Shorthand
subjects: Mathematics and two (2) of Geography, Commerce, Government, Principles of Accounts and Economics

title: CIVIL ENGINEERING TECHNOLOGY
utme_requirements:
Five (5) SSC credit passes in Mathematics, English Language, Physics and Chemistry and any one (1) subjects from:

Biology/Agricultural Science

Technical Drawing,

Auto Mechanics,

Metal Work,

Woodwork for Civil Engineering Technology,

Further Mathematics

Geography,

Economics/Commerce.
subjects: Mathematics, Physics and Chemistry.

title: COMPUTER ENGINEERING
utme_requirements:
Five (5) SSC credit passes in Mathematics ,English Language Physics and Chemistry and any one (1) subjects from:

Biology/Agricultural Science

Technical Drawing,

Basic Electronics/Basic Electricity,

Auto Mechanics,

Metal Work,

Woodwork (for Civil Engineering Tech.),

Further Mathematics

English Language,

Geography,

Economics/Commerce.
subjects: Mathematics, Physics and Chemistry.

title: COMPUTER SCIENCE
utme_requirements:
Five (5) SSC credit passes in Mathematics, a basic science and three (3) other subjects chosen from the following:

Economics,

Geography,

Government/History,

Further Mathematics,

Physics,

Chemistry,

Biology/Agricultural Science.

English Language,

Typewriting,

'O' Level credit passes in English Language and Physics is compulsory.
subjects: Mathematics and any two (2) of Geography, Physics, Economics or Chemistry.

title: ELECTRICAL/ELECTRONICS ENGINEERING
utme_requirements:
Five (5) 'O' Level credit passes in Mathematics ,English Language  Physics and Chemistry and any one (1) subjects from:

Biology/Agricultural Science

Technical Drawing,

BasicElectronics/Basic Electricity

,

Further Mathematics


Geography,

Economics/Commerce.

ICT/ComputerStudies/Data Processing
subjects: Mathematics, Physics, Chemistry

title: ESTATE MANAGEMENT & VALUATION
utme_requirements:
Five (5) 'O' Level credit passes in Mathematics, English Language, a basic science subject and any two (2) from the following:

Geography,

Economics/Commerce,

Physics,

Biology,

Chemistry,

Technical Drawing,

Fine Art,

Woodwork,

Literature,

Metal Work,

Principles of Accounts and Book Keeping

Government
subjects: Mathematics and any two (2) of Economics, Arts, Physics, Chemistry, Biology

title: FASHION DESIGN AND CLOTHING TECHNOLOGY
utme_requirements: Minimum of 5 Credits in O’ Level GCE, SSCE of WAEC,SSCE of NECO or  NTC of NABTEB obtained at not more than two sittings from English Language, Mathematic and any other three subjects from Chemistry, Physics, Biology/Agricultural Science/Animal Husbandry/Fisheries, Fine Arts/Visual Art/Technical Drawing/Cultural and Creative Art, Geography, Literature in English,  Economics, Health Science, Commerce/Marketing, Civic Education/ History/Government, Clothing and Textiles, Home Management/Food and Nutrition, Home Economics,  Dyeing and Bleaching,  Data Processing/Computer Studies/ICT, and any Nigerian Language.
subjects: OSPOLY accepts any of the listed O level course requirement as UTME subjects

title: FOOD TECHNOLOGY
utme_requirements:
Five (5) SSC credit passes in Mathematics, English Language,  Chemistry and Biology/Agricultural Science/Animal Husbandry and any one (1) of the following:

Physics, Technical Drawing,

Economics/Commerce,

 Further Mathematics,

 Food and Nutrition,

Geography,  ICT/Data Processing/Computer Studies and Statistics.
subjects: Biology/Agricultural Science and any two (2) of the following: Physics, Chemistry, Mathematics and Economics

title: LIBRARY AND INFORMATION SCIENCE
utme_requirements: Minimum of 5 Credits in O’Level GCE, SSCE of WAEC, SSCE of NECO or NTC of NABTEB obtained at not more than two sittings in English Language, Mathematics and any other three subjects from the following: Economics/Commerce, Principles of Accounts/Book-Keeping, English Literature, Geography, Biology/Agricultural Science, Chemistry, Physics, History, Government/Civic Education, ICT/Data Processing/Computer Studies, Fine Art and Basic Electricity.
subjects: Any three subjects from Arts/Social Science/Physical Science

title: MARKETING
utme_requirements: Minimum of 5 Credits  in O’ Level  GCE, SSCE of WAEC ,SSCE of NECO or NTC of NABTEB obtained at not more than two sittings in English Language,  Mathematics, and any other three subjects from the following: Commerce, Economics,  Business method/ Business Management, Principles of Accounts/ Book Keeping, Literature in English , Geography, Statistics, Biology/Agricultural Science, Marketing, Chemistry/ Physics, Government/Civic Education, History, and   ICT/Data Processing/Computer Studies
subjects: English, Mathematics,, Government/Civic Education, Commerce/Book keeping/Account and Marketing

title: MASS COMMUNICATION
utme_requirements:
Five (5) SSC credit passes in English Language, Mathematics and Literature in English and any two (2) other subjects from:

History,

Economics/Commerce,

Fine Arts,

Government,

Biology

Physics,

Chemistry

Basic Electricity

Geography,

Typewriting,

Commerce/Principles of Accounting.
subjects: Any three (3) subjects from Arts/Social Science/Physical Science.

title: MECHANICAL ENGINEERING TECHNOLOGY
utme_requirements:
Five (5) SSC credit passes in English Language, Mathematics, Physics, Chemistry and any one (1) subject from:

Biology/Agricultural Science

Technical Drawing,

Basic Electronics/Basic Electricity,

Auto Mechanics,

Metal Work,

Woodwork 

Further Mathematics

Geography,

Economics/Commerce.
subjects: Mathematics, Chemistry and Physics.

title: OFFICE TECHNOLOGY & MANAGEMENT
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes in English Language (not Literature in English) and Mathematics and any three (3) of the following: Economics/Commerce, Business Methods, Principles of Accounts, Literature in English, Geography, Office Practice, Biology/Agricultural Science, Chemistry, Physics, History/Government, Typewriting, Shorthand
subjects:
Any three (3) of: 
1. Mathematics
2. Economics
3. Commerce
4. History/Govt.
5. Geography
6. CRS/IS
7. Principles   of 
     Accounts.

title: PROCUREMENT AND SUPPLY CHAIN MANAGEMENT
utme_requirements: Minimum of 5 Credits  in O’ Level  GCE, SSCE of WAEC ,SSCE of NECO or NTC of NABTEB obtained at not more than two sittings in English Language,  Mathematics, and any other three subjects from the following: Storekeeping, Commerce, Economics,  Business method/ Business Management, Principles of Accounts/ Book Keeping, Geography, Biology/Agricultural Science, Marketing, Chemistry/ Physics, Government/Civic Education, History, and   ICT/Data Processing/Computer Studies and Statistics.
subjects: English, Mathematics, Store keeping/Commerce/Business Methods, Account/Economics/Marketing, Government/Civic Education/History/ICT/Computers Studies/Statistics

title: QUANTITY SURVEYING
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes in Mathematics. English Language and Physics or Chemistry and any two (2) of the following , Technical Drawing/Fine Arts/Visual Arts, Chemistry, Physics, Geography, Further Mathematics, Woodwork, Biology/Agricultural Science,  Metal Work,  Economics/Commerce, Bricklaying, Plumbing, Painting and Decoration, Carpentry, Craft, Building Construction,  Animal Husbandry/Fisheries,  Government/Civic Education/Marketing and ICT/Data Processing/ Computer Studies
subjects: Any three (3) of Physics, Mathematics, Geography, Economics, Biology/Agricultural Science

title: SCIENCE LABORATORY TECHNOLOGY
utme_requirements:
Five (5) SSC credit passes in Mathematics, English Language and two (2)  Basic Science ( Physics,

Biology, Chemistry)

and two (1) other subject from   Geography, Further Mathematics, ICT/Data Processing/Computer Studies, Economics/Commerce, Biology/Agricultural Science, Food and Nutrition, Physics, and Chemistry
subjects: Any three (3) of Mathematics, Biology/Agricultural Science or Physics

title: STATISTICS
utme_requirements:
Five (5) SSC credit passes in Mathematics,  English Language, one Basic Science subject (Physics, Chemistry, Biology) and any two (2) of the following:

Economics,

Geography, Chemistry, Biology,

Government/History/Civic Education

Further Mathematics,

Chemistry,  Agricultural Science/Animal Husbandry

Commerce/Marketing
subjects:
Any of the three (3): 
1. Economics/  
     Commerce
2. History/Government
3. CRS/IS
4. Mathematics

title: URBAN & REGIONAL PLANNING
utme_requirements:
Five (5) SSC credit passes in Mathematics, English Language,

and one Science subject from Physics, Chemistry,

Biology/AgriculturalScience/AnimalHusbandry and any two (2) other subjects from: Geography/Economics,  Civic Education/Government/ History,

Fine Art, Technical Drawing, Woodwork,  Data Processing/ICT/Computer Studies, Introduction to Building Construction, Bricklaying, Marketing/Commerce, Religious  Knowledge, Financial Accounting /Book Keeping/ Principle of Accounting, Statistics,

Further Mathematics, Chemistry Physics, Biology/Agricultural Science/Animal Husbandry,

Business Methods, and and any ther Nigerian Language.
subjects: Geography and two (2) other subjects from course requirement.

title: WELDING & FABRICATION TECHNOLOGY
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes in Mathematics, English Language, Physics and Chemistry and any one (1) subjects from Biology/ Agricultural Science, Technical Drawing, Basic Electronics/Basic Electricity, Auto Mechanics, Metal Work, Wood Work,  Further Mathematics,  Geography, Economics/ Commerce.
subjects: Mathematics, Physics and Chemistry
